page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content:
People come to{Piethorne Valley,} to do all sorts of different things. If you take a car to Piethorne, there is a{car park}on the left hand side of the road, as you go up. At the entrance of the car park, there is a notice board. On the notice board, there are a few plastic pockets,these hold{information leaflets,}about the area. Next to the car park there are{ {toilet facilities.}If you wanted to know about something that isn't in the leaflets, there is a door by the side of the toilet block, that says PRIVATE. This is the{Piethorne Valley {Warden's office.}If he is in, he will give you some information about Piethorne Valley.
C/F/19/6/85
